Keyes Sensors


- device: Ball Switch
  file: eg/ball-switch
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Ball Switch Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 7
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Seven Color Flash
  file: eg/seven-color-flash
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Seven Color Flash Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 13
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Relay
  file: eg/relay
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Relay Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 10
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Touch
  file: eg/touch
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Touch Breakout
  wiring:
    - AO to Analog 0
    - DO to Digital 6
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Laser Emitter
  file: eg/laser
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Laser Emitter Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 10
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Buzzer
  file: eg/piezo
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Buzzer Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 3
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Shock/Vibration
  file: eg/shock-vibration
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Shock/Vibration Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 2
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Rotary Encoder
  file: eg/rotary-encoder
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Rotary Encoder Breakout
  wiring:
    - Signal to Digital 10
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V

- device: Linear Magnetic Hall
  file: eg/linear-magnetic-hall
  parts:
    - Arduino
    - Linear Magnetic Hall Breakout
  wiring:
    - AO to Analog 0
    - DO to Digital 2
    - Ground to Ground
    - Power to 5V






Buzzer: eg/piezo
Laser Emitter: eg/laser
Shock/Vibration: eg/shock-vibration
Rotary Encoder: eg/rotary-encoder








Linear Magnetic Hall: eg/linear-magnetic-hall
Hall Magnetic Field: eg/hall-magnetic-field
Buzzer: eg/piezo
Laser Emitter: eg/laser
Shock/Vibration: eg/shock-vibration
Rotary Encoder: eg/rotary-encoder
Touch: eg/touch
Relay: eg/relay
Seven Color Flash: eg/eg/seven-color-flash
Heart Beat: eg/heart-beat
